website_summaries.verdict: The BenQ EW2740L is a moderately priced, 27-inch, Vertical Alignment (VA) monitor that displays deep blacks, solid gray-scale reproduction, and wide viewing angles. Though it doesn't come with a lot of features, its high contrast ratio brings good shadow and highlight detail.

customer_reviews.title: It's just okay. Nothing amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Not as amazing as I had hoped. It's still a nice looking monitor and good for the price but the display quality is already "just okay" on it's best settings. Get's even less so the more I adjust for the low blue light feature. Don't get me wrong, that part works decently, but I still need to wear my glasses when I use it. Now that I think about it, unless you're gonna adjust the low blue light feature to it's fullest extent and be okay with the mediocre display quality, I'd pass on this monitor. There's nothing great about the display.
customer_reviews.author: MickReviews

customer_reviews.title: great monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: great monitor for the price. I was searching for something without a flicker and with low blu-light settings. this one TESTED by me to be without any flickers and it works perfectly for last 3 years!

customer_reviews.title: The color and uniformity are good. I'm another one of those people who has ...
customer_reviews.text: It's an attractive monitor. The color and uniformity are good. I'm another one of those people who has suffered from eyestrain and nausea with some, though not all, other monitors. I have never had an issue with this monitor which is why I want to strongly recommend it for consideration by people with similar problems.

customer_reviews.text: The monitor has worked very well for me. I have eye strain with some programs using my Dell 24" monitor, mainly because the text is too pixelated. The Ben Q has more dense text.

customer_reviews.title: Reduces eye strain
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these monitors because of eye strain from regular monitors. These are supposed to use low blue light, a source of eye strain. Right away we noticed our eyes were not feeling strained as before. I would recommend this monitor. One hitch are the connections: VGA and HDMI. VGA is slowly being phased out so make sure your computer has VGA (Blue connection) and HDMI.

customer_reviews.title: My monitor was seriously defective, had to be returned.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the monitor I received generated some strange background colors--pink where previously it was white--but much more importantly the monitor would power down when the computer went into sleep mode and could not be brought back to life without unplugging it. BenQ's tech support was worthless. They do answer the phone but both techs with whom I spoke did not give me any sense that they understood the problem, let alone had a fix. The second tech finally allowed as how the monitor might be defective. At least Amazon made the return process easier.

customer_reviews.title: I can't stop looking at this monitor!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great overall design. Fantastic picture for gaming (I tried with Xbox) and screen mirroring (from Macbook Pro). The zero flicker technology is wonderful but the blue light is not really useful unless you REALLY read a lot on this monitor. It is hard to do quick changes in the settings. A little pricy, but for person who has the use for it, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Reza

customer_reviews.title: I applaud BenQ's efforts to make more eye friendly hardware.  It just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this monitor but returned it. My sons loved the 27 inch screen for games and movies. It will be a good product for another customer. I have concluded that my eyes are sensitive to LED back lighting. The BenQ website promoting the 'Eye-care' line looked like it was written for me. Reduction of blue light and flicker sounded like the right prescription. I knew by the 2nd night of use that it had to go back. Even with the most blue light reduction, I still could not look at it. Have gone back to my old 20 inch CCFL LCD monitor.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Best non-IPS monitor out there IMO
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the price. Unless you want to pay for IPS, this is a top notch monitor. I love the low-profile edges. The only drawback is the touch-button controls for power and the monitor menu are almost impossible to see in low light, and trying by feel usually ends up activating the wrong button. But as far as quality, seriously can't beat this short of an IPS monitor. Blows the TN monitors out of the water. I play games such as Skyrim, Witcher 3, ESO, and Arkham Knight on full graphics and I have no issues. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Mills

product_meta.title: BenQ MHL Cloud Connected Monitor EW2740L 27-Inch Screen LED-lit Monitor
product_meta.description:
Enjoy a cinema-class picture in the comfort of your own personal space.View larger DESIGNED FOR CLOUD CONTENT FROM YOUR ROKU, SMARTPHONE, OR OTHER DEVICES
With a sophisticated all-around slim design and equipped with the latest MHL connection, the all-new BenQ EW40 Series of monitors take your Netflix, MLB.tv, Hulu, or other content to a new level. With its beautiful slim bezel and elegant lines, the monitor can operate as your primary display in nearly any space for either home entertainment or office work.

TRANSFORM MOBILE ENTERTAINMENT WITH INTEGRATED MHL CONNECTION
Designed specifically for your smart device, the new EW40 Series features both HDMI and MHL connections to deliver HD picture quality as well as flawless streaming from any MHL-equipped smart device. The monitor will enable you to enlarge and optimize any content displayed on your smart device effortlessly. With this feature, you can browse websites, watch videos, play games and even go over various documents on a full size screen--without having to turn on your computer at all.

REVOLUTIONEYES—MONITOR TECHNOLOGY BUILT FOR YOU
With monitors purpose-built for critical functions for gamers, graphic designers, photographers, artists, creative and business professionals, BenQ balances aesthetic appeal with peak performance and comfort. In the EW Series, RevolutionEyes technology includes ZeroFlicker, Low Blue Light mode, and an intuitive UI with comfortable extended viewing. BenQ is revolutionizing the monitor industry with improved resolutions, faster response time and quicker refresh rates. With sleekly designed monitors to complement today's trendiest home and office environments, BenQ is leading the way with purpose-built solutions that deliver incredible value and the very best user experience.


View larger HEIGHTEN YOUR MOVIE ENJOYMENT WITH CINEMA MODE
Enabled by BenQ's exclusive color engine technology, the Cinema Mode automatically processes and fine-tunes video contents to perfection, so that a truly dynamic cinema experience is what you'll get.

View larger UPSCALE EVERY VIEWING EXPERIENCE WITH SUPER RESOLUTION
To give you an optimal online video watching experience, the EW40 Series simulates high-resolution images by boosting the pixel density of the original video source with the Super Resolution image enhancement feature.

View larger DISTRACTION-FREE VIEWING WITH SMART FOCUS
Smart Focus allows you to pinpoint a window or area on the screen and make that the focal point. By concealing the rest of the visual content, you're able to focus on exactly what you aim to enjoy.

View larger FLICKER-FREE BACKLIGHT FOR VISUAL PLEASURE
The flicker-free technology eliminates flickering at all brightness levels and effectively reducing eye fatigue. Conventional LCD screens flicks 200 times per second. Your eyes may not see flickers, but can certainly feel them. Free your eyes from flickers by switching to flicker-free monitors and let your eyes do less work.

View larger LOW BLUE LIGHT MODE
Every monitor produces a strain of blue spectrum light that is one of the critical causes of eye damage, eye strain, headaches, and sleeping disorders. BenQ's unique Low Blue Light technology is designed to deal with the everyday problem of blue light exposure and allows a healthier time spent in front of your computer. Switch to one of the four preset Low Blue Light Modes from OSD hot key (Multimedia – 30% reduction; Web-surfing – 50% reduction; Office – 60% reduction, Reading – 70% reduction), and reward your eyes without having to lose the visual enjoyment.

WINDOWS 8 AND 8.1 COMPATIBLE
The EW Series have passed Windows 8 certification and is fully compatible with Windows 8 color systems. Plug in the EW Series Monitor to your computer, and Windows 8 will recognize it instantly, making setup and connection effortless.
